alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley; Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills; Eastern San Gabriel Mountains; Interstate 5 Corridor; Northern Ventura County Mountains; Southern Ventura County Mountains; Western Antelope Valley Foothills; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 02 at 8:22PM PDT until April 04 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT MONDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM MONDAY TO 5 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, northwest winds 35 to 45 mph with damaging gusts up to 70 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, west to northwest winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Southern Ventura County Mountains, Northern Ventura County Mountains, Interstate 5 Corridor, Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor, Eastern San Gabriel Mountains, Western Antelope Valley Foothills, Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills and Antelope Valley. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 5 AM Monday to 5 AM PDT Tuesday. For the Wind Advisory, until 5 AM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Areas of blowing dust and sand could locally reduce visibilities due to blowing dust and sand in the Antelope Valley on Monday.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
